name: ainnomix/module-etm-core
description: Magento 2 Entity types manager. Core functionality

suggest.ainnomix/module-etm-adminhtml: Provides UI interface for entity type management
suggest.ainnomix/module-etm-api: Provides API functionality for custom entity types
suggest.ainnomix/module-etm-staging: Adds staging functionality for custom entity types. Allowed only for Magento Enterprise Edition
